/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with bare trees, their leafless branches reaching towards the clear blue sky. The buildings on either side of the street are mostly white and gray, their neutral tones contrasting with the vibrant blue of the sky. A few cars can be seen on the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and the buildings, and gives a sense of being immersed in the scene.
